        public boolean error(int errorCode,
            java.lang.Object info,
            java.lang.Throwable error,
            java.lang.Object... metaData)
        Fires an error event with the specified error information.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - a code for the error
        info - information on the error
        error - an error object (useful for getting a stack trace)
        metaData - extra meta data about the erro
        Returns:
        if the error was handled or not by one of the ErrorHandlers
